article.headline: Grambling 64, Miss. Valley St. 59
article.story: ITTA BENA, Miss. (AP) -- Brion Rush had 18 points to lead Grambling State to a 64-59 victory over Mississippi Valley State University on Monday night. Grambling State (9-7, 7-2 Southwestern Athletic Conference) won its sixth straight game. Andre Ratliff added 15 points for the Tigers. Mike Thomas led Valley with 18 points. Sandford Speech had 13 points and Kadrian Bryant had 13 rebounds for the Delta Devils (6-12, 6-3), who have followed a four-game winning streak with two consecutive losses. Grambling State shot 48 percent, but Missisippi Valley State held a 38-29 rebounding advantage.
